title: The last day of NFL action has thrown up an incredible first - 08-Jan-2024 - NZ Rugby League news
text: News | Rugby League 8 Jan 2024 12:14 | outlook hotmail | yahoo mail | gmail | news | weather | finance | shopping | about nzcity | Search | NZCity News SEARCH Google Bing NZ News NewsLinks the White Pages NZ Street Names the Yellow Pages Yahoo NZ Web sites SearchNZ NZ Domain Names CUSTOMISE Start Page Personalise News Top Stories Business Sports Politics Health & Safety Law and Order Technology Education Living & Travel Entertainment Motoring Environment National International Accidents Maori Rural Local Politics Sport Weather Finance Shopping Jobs Horoscopes Lotto Results Photo Gallery Site Gallery TVNow Dating SearchNZ NZSearch Crime.co.nz RugbyLeague Make Home About NZCity Contact NZCity Your Privacy Advertising Login Join for Free Home > News > Sports > Rugby League The last day of NFL action has thrown up an incredible first The last day of NFL action has thrown up an incredible first 8 January 2024 - article from www.rugbyleague.co.nz Not once since the AFL-NFL merger in 1970 has any division finished the season with all teams delivering a positive winning record. This season AFC North pulled off the feat. The Ravens won the AFC Conference, the Browns and Steelers made the play-offs and the Bengals finishing with a .529 winning percentage. They're now officially the winningest league in NFL history. >> More Rugby League News © 2024 Newstalk ZB, NZCity Other Rugby League News 08 Jan: Rafael Nadal has withdrawn from the Australian Tennis Open with a hip injury 03 Jan: Working with former Kiwis captain Benji Marshall has been a major drawcard for Jarome Luai in confirming a five-year NRL deal with the Wests Tigers from 2025 03 Jan: Jarome Luai has revealed the reasons behind his switch to the Wests Tigers in 12 months time 01 Jan: An important stretch looms for the Breakers as they look to continue their climb up the ladder in the Australian Basketball League 26 Dec: NRL rugby league player Troy Dargan has died in a motorcycle accident while on holiday in the Cook Islands 26 Dec: Former captain Gary Neville has described Manchester United's year a "disgrace to the end" after Sir Jim Ratcliffe's acquisition of a 25 per cent stake in the club 24 Dec: The night when the USA Tomahawks nearly beat Australia and pulled off the greatest upset in rugby league history Top Stories RUGBY New Zealand ski star Alice Robinson has made a solid start to the 2024 portion of her Giant Slalom World Cup season, claiming an eighth-place finish at the latest event in Slovenia More... BUSINESS Australia's biggest employers will be named and shamed when their gender pay gaps are exposed More... Today's News Cricket: Will Cameron Bancroft get a chance to atone in the Australian test cricket side? 11:57 Entertainment: Golden Globes 2024 winners list: Barbie and Oppenheimer lead film nominations, Succession dominates TV nods 11:57 Cycling: Track cyclist Aaron Gate expects next month's World Cup event in Adelaide to indicate whether New Zealand's men's team pursuit will be a medal prospect at the Paris Olympics 11:07 Health & Safety: Doctors advocates are warning medical IT systems are outdated, after a technical error at Hawke's Bay Hospital almost cost a child her life 10:37 Politics: The Prime Minister's reflecting on his quick rise to leading the country 10:27 International: Two hikers killed in Italian Alps avalanche near Switzerland 10:17 Health & Safety: A warning of the risks of IT flaws, after a near miss involving a child at a Hawke's Bay Hospital 9:27 Law and Order: Korea's deadliest strip of land the scene of brutal axe murder, assassination attempt and shooting of housewife 9:17 Environment: People in Victoria, South Australia and New South Wales are being urged to prepare, with rainfall totals of up to 200 millimeters and flooding forecast for some areas 8:17 Basketball: The Breakers have endured a 108-102 defeat to the Wildcats ending a four-game winning streak in Australian NBL basketball action at Auckland 8:07 News Search Rugby League NZ News NewsLinks NZ Web Power Search © 2024 New Zealand City Ltd
